<h4>DOMPurify</h4>

DOMPurify is a DOM-only, super-fast, uber-tolerant XSS sanitizer for HTML, MathML and SVG.

Npm link：[https://www.npmjs.com/package/dompurify]

If you want to purify the html string on Node.js, you can use isomorphic-dompurify
